title: Successful Multi-type Donation Workflow with PIX Payment
description: Verify that a user can complete a donation selecting Tithes, entering a valid amount, filling in personal info, selecting church location, choosing PIX payment, scanning QR code, paying successfully, and receiving a downloadable PDF receipt.

steps.description: Navigate to donation form and select donation type 'Tithes'
Enter valid custom donation amount with correct currency formatting
Fill in personal information with valid name, CPF (correct format and checksum), email, and phone
Select one of the available church locations
Select PIX as the payment method
Verify QR code and PIX copy-paste code are displayed correctly
Simulate completing payment by scanning QR code or using PIX code
Confirm real-time payment status updates to 'confirmed' within expected timeout
Download the PDF receipt and verify it includes all donor and donation details, church branding, and verification QR code

title: Donation Form Validates Personal Information Inputs Properly
description: Check validity and error handling for incorrect inputs in personal information fields including CPF, email, and phone number.

steps.description: Navigate to personal information form in donation workflow
Enter invalid CPF less than 11 digits and observe validation error
Display appropriate CPF format error message in Portuguese
Enter CPF with invalid checksum digits and observe validation error
Display CPF checksum validation error
Enter invalid email format and observe validation error message
Email format validation error message is shown
Enter invalid phone number format and observe validation
Show phone number validation error in Portuguese

title: Credit Card Payment Process with Installments Success
description: Verify that credit card payment works with tokenization, installment selection, and proper handling by Mercado Pago API, then reflecting payment success to the user with receipt generation.

steps.description: Select a donation type and enter valid donation amount
Fill valid personal information and select church location
Choose Credit Card as payment method
Enter valid credit card details supporting major card brands
Select valid installment option if applicable
Card data is tokenized securely before payment processing
Payment is successfully processed and user receives confirmation
User can download the PDF receipt with all details, branding, and verification QR code

title: Donation Amount Validation: Minimum and Currency Format
description: Check that the donation amount input accepts only valid currency formatted numbers above minimum allowed value and rejects invalid or empty inputs with real-time feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to donation amount input field
Enter an amount below the minimum permissible threshold
Show error indicating minimum donation amount requirement
Enter non-numeric or malformed currency input
Show error for invalid currency format
Leave amount field empty
Show required field validation error

title: Donor Information Auto-fill Based on Existing CPF
description: Verify that when a donor enters a CPF registered in the system, personal information fields are auto-filled correctly to improve user experience.

steps.description: Navigate to donation form personal info section
Enter an existing registered CPF
Verify that name, email, and phone fields auto-fill with correct donor information
Modify auto-filled info and confirm the user can proceed with changes

title: Donation History Search by CPF and Location with Real-time Status Updates
description: Test donation history search functionality returns accurate filtered results by CPF and church location, updates payment statuses in real-time, and allows regeneration of PDF receipts.

steps.description: Navigate to donation history search page
Enter a valid CPF and select a church location
Submit search query
Verify that the list of donations is accurately filtered by CPF and location
Statuses of pending payments update automatically over time
Attempt to regenerate and download PDF receipt for one of the donations
Receipt PDF is correctly generated and downloadable with proper contents and branding

title: Receipt Sharing via WhatsApp with Correct PDF Attachment and Preformatted Message
description: Confirm that the receipt sharing functionality generates a preformatted WhatsApp message and attaches the correct PDF receipt, working on both desktop and mobile environments.

steps.description: Navigate to donation history and select a completed donation
Use the share via WhatsApp option
Check that PDF receipt is attached properly
Verify the preformatted message content is present and correctly localized in Portuguese
Confirm the sharing trigger opens WhatsApp interface for sending message on desktop and mobile

title: Admin Dashboard Access with Secure Authentication and Session Handling
description: Verify that only valid admin users can log in securely, with sessions properly managed and unauthorized access prevented.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page
Attempt login with invalid credentials
Access is denied with meaningful Portuguese error message
Log in with valid admin credentials
Access admin dashboard successfully with valid session
Attempt to access dashboard URL without authentication in a fresh session
Redirect to login page or block access
Log out and verify session ends effectively

title: Admin Dashboard Donation Metrics, Filtering, Pagination, and Cleanup
description: Test that the admin dashboard displays accurate aggregated donation metrics and allows filtering donation records by parameters, supports pagination, and enables cleanup actions.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open dashboard
Verify displayed stats: total donations, total amount, unique donors, pending payments match backend data
Apply filters for donation type and payment status
Donation list updates correctly according to filters
Navigate through donation list pages using pagination controls
Pagination works smoothly without loading delays
Execute cleanup action to clear or handle donation statuses as per system features
Cleanup completes with proper confirmation and database update

title: API Error Handling with Meaningful Portuguese Messages on Donation Submission
description: Ensure that API endpoints for donations handle invalid inputs, payment failures, and unexpected errors gracefully by returning meaningful error messages in Portuguese.

steps.description: Submit donation API request with invalid personal information (e.g., malformed CPF)
API responds with HTTP 400 and detailed validation error message in Portuguese
Simulate payment failure in Mercado Pago during API call
API returns payment failure status with user-friendly error message
Send malformed request payload or unsupported payment method
API returns appropriate error code with meaningful explanation

title: Responsive and Accessible UI on Mobile and Desktop
description: Test that the user interface is fully responsive, accessible, and performs within required page load (<3s) and API response (<2s) targets on both desktop and mobile devices.

steps.description: Open donation form on desktop screen and mobile screen (emulated or real)
Verify layout adjusts properly and UI controls remain usable
Check that form inputs have proper labels and meet accessibility standards (e.g., screen reader friendly)
Accessibility checks pass
Measure page load time and note API response times during interaction
All page loads under 3 seconds, all API responses under 2 seconds

title: Donation History Search Returns No Results for Unknown CPF
description: Verify that entering a CPF not present in the database returns an empty but valid response with appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to donation history search
Enter a valid, but unregistered CPF and any church location
Submit search
The system displays a message indicating no donations found, in Portuguese
No errors occur and UI remains responsive
